author: stas
msg: fix the apr_size_t entry to be unsigned long (UV)

author: stas
msg: always upcase the query key, incase it was requested lowercased (the
lowercased works with the real apxs query, but when it's emulated it must

author: stas
msg: s/includedir/INCLUDEDIR/, when configured without apxs mod_perl uses upper

author: gozer
msg: When stitching content of <Perl > sections together, it's important to
preserve a \n between the lines, otherwise, the first encountered comment
will eat all the code after it. Also would break HERE documents, etc.

author: stas
msg: - drop the unused macros: APACHE_PREFIX and APACHE_LIBDIR
